name: TimeSlider
description:
The brilliant Scientist Pinky has just finished her ultimate creation: A synthetic being called 'Ant Queen'. But maybe this one turned out TOO well. With a mind of her own, Ant Queen sets out to break free of Pinky's Lab, and escape to freedom...

A short, time-and-space-bending puzzle game.

Made for Ludum Dare 47. ( Ludum Dare Page )

Uses ChevyRay's Pixel Fonts.

Sprites by Zach Lazarus
A Dopterra story set in the universe of Creepy Castle, featuring returning character designs by Krystal Fleming.
